amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-289 to clarify that, for the purpose of the Agency's Office of Minority and Women Inclusion, "minority" is understood to include Native Hawaiians and Alaska Natives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 116-289 to clarify that, for the purpose of the Agency's Office of Minority and Women Inclusion, "minority" is understood to include Native Hawaiians and Alaska Natives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Case.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
